trans-unit.target: **注意︰** <xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType>相当于<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>使用<xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument>时类，并且能与作为元素相同的子级。 | |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nodes.| |所有其他<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>节点 |不能有子节点。 |</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XmlDocument> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XmlNodeType>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current node has any child nodes; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果当前节点具有任何子节点;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the markup representing the child nodes of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 获取或设置表示当前节点的子节点的标记。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the markup of the child nodes of the current node.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，包含当前节点的子节点标记。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The InnerXml property cannot be set.
trans-unit.target: 无法设置 InnerXml 属性。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object used to create a new sibling node after the currently selected node.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>对象用于在当前所选节点之后创建一个新的同级节点。</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the InsertAfter method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用 InsertAfter 方法时要考虑的重要说明。

trans-unit.source: - The new sibling node is not inserted until the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object is called.
trans-unit.target: -新的同级节点不会插入直到<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A>方法<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>对象称为。</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> </xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertAfter method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: -InsertAfter 方法是仅当<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位于元素、 文本、 处理指令或注释节点上。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertAfter method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -InsertAfter 方法不会影响<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>的位置

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object used to create a new sibling node after the currently selected node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>对象用于在当前所选节点之后创建一个新的同级节点。</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not allow a new sibling node to be inserted after the current node.
trans-unit.target: 位置<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>不允许在当前节点之后插入一个新同级节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>不支持编辑。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new sibling node after the currently selected node using the XML string specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的 XML 字符串在当前所选节点之后创建一个新的同级节点。

trans-unit.source: To create a new element node, include all XML syntax in the XML string parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建一个新元素节点，请在 XML 字符串参数中包括所有的 XML 语法。

trans-unit.source: The string for a new `book` node is `InsertAfter("<book/>")`.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的字符串`book`节点是`InsertAfter("<book/>")`。

trans-unit.source: The string for inserting the text "book" after the current node's text node is `InsertAfter("book")`.
trans-unit.target: 插入文本"book"在当前节点的文本节点后的字符串为`InsertAfter("book")`。

trans-unit.source: If the XML string contains multiple nodes, all nodes are added.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XML 字符串包含多个节点，将添加所有节点。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the InsertAfter method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用 InsertAfter 方法时要考虑的重要说明。

trans-unit.source: - The InsertAfter method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: -InsertAfter 方法是仅当<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位于元素、 文本、 处理指令或注释节点上。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertAfter method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -InsertAfter 方法不会影响<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>的位置

trans-unit.source: The XML data string for the new sibling node.
trans-unit.target: 新的同级节点的 XML 数据字符串。

trans-unit.source: The XML string parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: XML 字符串参数是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not allow a new sibling node to be inserted after the current node.
trans-unit.target: 位置<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>不允许在当前节点之后插入一个新同级节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>不支持编辑。

trans-unit.source: The XML string parameter is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: XML 字符串参数不是格式正确的。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new sibling node after the currently selected node using the XML contents of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用的 XML 内容在当前所选节点之后创建一个新的同级节点<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>指定对象。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the InsertAfter method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用 InsertAfter 方法时要考虑的重要说明。

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, all the nodes in the sequence are added.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>对象是否定位在 XML 节点的序列，将添加序列中的所有节点。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertAfter method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: -InsertAfter 方法是仅当<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位于元素、 文本、 处理指令或注释节点上。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertAfter method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -InsertAfter 方法不会影响<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>的位置

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object positioned on the XML data for the new sibling node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>新的同级节点的 XML 数据上定位的对象。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object is in an error state or closed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>对象处于错误状态或已关闭。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>对象参数是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not allow a new sibling node to be inserted after the current node.
trans-unit.target: 位置<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>不允许在当前节点之后插入一个新同级节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>不支持编辑。

trans-unit.source: The XML contents of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object parameter is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: XML 内容<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>对象参数不是格式正确。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new sibling node after the currently selected node using the nodes in the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用中的节点在当前所选节点之后创建一个新的同级节点<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>指定对象。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the InsertAfter method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用 InsertAfter 方法时要考虑的重要说明。

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, all the nodes in the sequence are added.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>对象是否定位在 XML 节点的序列，将添加序列中的所有节点。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertAfter method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: -InsertAfter 方法是仅当<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位于元素、 文本、 处理指令或注释节点上。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertAfter method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -InsertAfter 方法不会影响<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>的位置

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object positioned on the node to add as the new sibling node.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>定位在要添加为新的同级节点的节点上的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>对象参数是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not allow a new sibling node to be inserted after the current node.
trans-unit.target: 位置<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>不允许在当前节点之后插入一个新同级节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>不支持编辑。

trans-unit.source: Returns an <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object used to create a new sibling node before the currently selected node.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>用于创建新的同级节点当前所选节点前的对象。</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the InsertBefore method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用 InsertBefore 方法时要考虑的重要说明。

trans-unit.source: - The new sibling node is not inserted until the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A> method of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object is called.
trans-unit.target: -新的同级节点不会插入直到<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A>方法<xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>对象称为。</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> </xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter.Close%2A>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertBefore method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: -InsertBefore 方法是仅当<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位于元素、 文本、 处理指令或注释节点上。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertBefore method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -InsertBefore 方法不会影响<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>的位置

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter> object used to create a new sibling node before the currently selected node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>用于创建新的同级节点当前所选节点前的对象。</xref:System.Xml.XmlWriter>

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not allow a new sibling node to be inserted before the current node.
trans-unit.target: 位置<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>不允许当前节点的前面插入新的同级节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>不支持编辑。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new sibling node before the currently selected node using the XML string specified.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的同级节点，使用指定的 XML 字符串在当前所选节点之前。

trans-unit.source: To create a new element node, include all XML syntax in the XML string parameter.
trans-unit.target: 若要创建一个新元素节点，请在 XML 字符串参数中包括所有的 XML 语法。

trans-unit.source: The string for a new `book` node is `InsertBefore("<book/>")`.
trans-unit.target: 一个新的字符串`book`节点是`InsertBefore("<book/>")`。

trans-unit.source: The string for inserting the text "book" before the current node's text node is `InsertBefore("book")`.
trans-unit.target: 插入文本"book"在当前节点的文本节点之前的字符串为`InsertBefore("book")`。

trans-unit.source: If the XML string contains multiple nodes, all nodes are added.
trans-unit.target: 如果 XML 字符串包含多个节点，将添加所有节点。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the InsertBefore method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用 InsertBefore 方法时要考虑的重要说明。

trans-unit.source: - The InsertBefore method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: -InsertBefore 方法是仅当<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位于元素、 文本、 处理指令或注释节点上。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertBefore method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -InsertBefore 方法不会影响<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>的位置

trans-unit.source: The XML data string for the new sibling node.
trans-unit.target: 新的同级节点的 XML 数据字符串。

trans-unit.source: The XML string parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: XML 字符串参数是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not allow a new sibling node to be inserted before the current node.
trans-unit.target: 位置<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>不允许当前节点的前面插入新的同级节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>不支持编辑。

trans-unit.source: The XML string parameter is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: XML 字符串参数不是格式正确的。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new sibling node before the currently selected node using the XML contents of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object specified.
trans-unit.target: 创建新的同级节点使用的 XML 内容在当前所选节点之前<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>指定对象。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the InsertBefore method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用 InsertBefore 方法时要考虑的重要说明。

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, all the nodes in the sequence are added.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>对象是否定位在 XML 节点的序列，将添加序列中的所有节点。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertBefore method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: -InsertBefore 方法是仅当<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位于元素、 文本、 处理指令或注释节点上。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertBefore method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -InsertBefore 方法不会影响<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>的位置

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object positioned on the XML data for the new sibling node.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>新的同级节点的 XML 数据上定位的对象。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object is in an error state or closed.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>对象处于错误状态或已关闭。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>对象参数是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not allow a new sibling node to be inserted before the current node.
trans-unit.target: 位置<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>不允许当前节点的前面插入新的同级节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>不支持编辑。

trans-unit.source: The XML contents of the <xref:System.Xml.XmlReader> object parameter is not well-formed.
trans-unit.target: XML 内容<xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>对象参数不是格式正确。</xref:System.Xml.XmlReader>

trans-unit.source: Creates a new sibling node before the currently selected node using the nodes in the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: 创建新的同级节点使用中的节点在当前所选节点之前<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>指定。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the InsertBefore method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用 InsertBefore 方法时要考虑的重要说明。

trans-unit.source: - If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> object is positioned over a sequence of XML nodes, all the nodes in the sequence are added.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>对象是否定位在 XML 节点的序列，将添加序列中的所有节点。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertBefore method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: -InsertBefore 方法是仅当<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位于元素、 文本、 处理指令或注释节点上。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertBefore method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -InsertBefore 方法不会影响<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>的位置

trans-unit.source: An <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object positioned on the node to add as the new sibling node.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>定位在要添加为新的同级节点的节点上的对象。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> object parameter is <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>对象参数是<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not allow a new sibling node to be inserted before the current node.
trans-unit.target: 位置<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>不允许当前节点的前面插入新的同级节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>不支持编辑。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new sibling element after the current node using the namespace prefix, local name and namespace URI specified, with the value specified.
trans-unit.target: 使用命名空间前缀、 本地名称和命名空间 URI，指定的值在当前节点之后创建一个新的同级元素。

trans-unit.source: Namespace prefix and URI values can be obtained using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Namespace 前缀和 URI 值可以通过获取<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A>或<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A>方法。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the following syntax inserts a sibling element by using the in-scope namespace `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`: ``` navigator.InsertElementAfter(navigator.Prefix, "pages", LookupNamespaceURI(navigator.Prefix), String.Empty) ``` This creates the new sibling `<bk:pages/>` element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，以下语法将插入一个同级元素使用的范围内命名空间`xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`:``` navigator.InsertElementAfter(navigator.Prefix, "pages", LookupNamespaceURI(navigator.Prefix), String.Empty) ```这将创建新的同级`<bk:pages/>`元素。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the InsertElementAfter method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用 InsertElementAfter 方法时要考虑的重要说明。

trans-unit.source: - If the namespace prefix specified is `null` or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, then the prefix for the namespace URI of the new element is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope.
trans-unit.target: -如果指定的命名空间前缀是`null`或<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>，然后从当前命名空间范围内获取的命名空间 URI 的新元素的前缀。</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, then a namespace prefix is automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有分配给指定的命名空间 URI 在当前范围内命名空间前缀，则会自动生成的命名空间前缀。

trans-unit.source: - The InsertElementAfter method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: -InsertElementAfter 方法是仅当<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位于元素、 文本、 处理指令或注释节点上。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertElementAfter method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -InsertElementAfter 方法不会影响<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>的位置

trans-unit.source: The namespace prefix of the new child element (if any).
trans-unit.target: 新的子元素 （如果有） 的命名空间前缀。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the new child element (if any).
trans-unit.target: 新的子元素 （如果有） 的本地名称。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the new child element (if any).
trans-unit.target: 命名空间 URI 的新的子元素 （如果有）。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>和<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>是等效的。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The value of the new child element.
trans-unit.target: 新的子元素的值。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.String> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> are passed, an empty element is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.String>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>传递一个空元素创建的。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not allow a new sibling node to be inserted after the current node.
trans-unit.target: 位置<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>不允许在当前节点之后插入一个新同级节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>不支持编辑。

trans-unit.source: Creates a new sibling element before the current node using the namespace prefix, local name, and namespace URI specified, with the value specified.
trans-unit.target: 创建一个新的同级元素，使用命名空间前缀、 本地名称和命名空间 URI，指定的值在当前节点之前。

trans-unit.source: Namespace prefix and URI values can be obtained using the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A> or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Namespace 前缀和 URI 值可以通过获取<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A>或<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A>方法。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupNamespace%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LookupPrefix%2A>

trans-unit.source: For example, the following syntax inserts a sibling element by using the in-scope namespace `xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`: ``` navigator.InsertElementBefore(navigator.Prefix, "pages", LookupNamespaceURI(navigator.Prefix), String.Empty) ``` This creates the new sibling `<bk:pages/>` element.
trans-unit.target: 例如，以下语法将插入一个同级元素使用的范围内命名空间`xmlns:bk="http://www.contoso.com/books"`:``` navigator.InsertElementBefore(navigator.Prefix, "pages", LookupNamespaceURI(navigator.Prefix), String.Empty) ```这将创建新的同级`<bk:pages/>`元素。

trans-unit.source: The following are important notes to consider when using the InsertElementBefore method.
trans-unit.target: 以下是使用 InsertElementBefore 方法时要考虑的重要说明。

trans-unit.source: - If the namespace prefix specified is `null` or <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>, then the prefix for the namespace URI of the new element is obtained from the current namespaces in-scope.
trans-unit.target: -如果指定的命名空间前缀是`null`或<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>，然后从当前命名空间范围内获取的命名空间 URI 的新元素的前缀。</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If there is no namespace prefix assigned to the specified namespace URI at the current scope, then a namespace prefix is automatically generated.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有分配给指定的命名空间 URI 在当前范围内命名空间前缀，则会自动生成的命名空间前缀。

trans-unit.source: - The InsertElementBefore method is valid only when the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an element, text, processing instruction, or comment node.
trans-unit.target: -InsertElementBefore 方法是仅当<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位于元素、 文本、 处理指令或注释节点上。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The InsertElementBefore method does not affect the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: -InsertElementBefore 方法不会影响<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>的位置

trans-unit.source: The namespace prefix of the new child element (if any).
trans-unit.target: 新的子元素 （如果有） 的命名空间前缀。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the new child element (if any).
trans-unit.target: 新的子元素 （如果有） 的本地名称。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the new child element (if any).
trans-unit.target: 命名空间 URI 的新的子元素 （如果有）。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.String> and <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> are equivalent.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>和<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>是等效的。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The value of the new child element.
trans-unit.target: 新的子元素的值。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.String> or <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> are passed, an empty element is created.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.String>或<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref>传递一个空元素创建的。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not allow a new sibling node to be inserted before the current node.
trans-unit.target: 位置<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>不允许当前节点的前面插入新的同级节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> does not support editing.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>不支持编辑。

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is a descendant of the current <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 确定是否指定<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>是当前的子代<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is a descendant of the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> if it is positioned on a descendant node of the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>为当前<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>如果它位于当前<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>的子代节点上</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>的后代</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Take, for example, the following XML string: `<item><name>widget</name></item>` If the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the `item` node, and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified is positioned on the `name` node, IsDescendant returns `true`.
trans-unit.target: 采用，例如，下面的 XML 字符串︰`<item><name>widget</name></item>`如果当前<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位于`item`节点，和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>指定位于`name`节点，IsDescendant 返回`true`。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This method always returns `false` under the following conditions: - The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified shares the same implementation but points at a different document instance than the current navigator.
trans-unit.target: 此方法始终返回`false`以下情况下:-<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>指定的共享相同的实现，但在其他文档的点实例比当前导航器。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified has a different implementation than the current navigator.
trans-unit.target: -<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>指定具有比当前导航器的不同实现。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to compare to this <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>要与此<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is a descendant of the current <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果指定<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>是当前的子代<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets a value indicating whether the current node is an empty element without an end element tag.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取一个值，该值指示当前节点是否一个没有结束元素标记的空元素。

trans-unit.source: This property enables you to determine the difference between the following different elements.
trans-unit.target: 此属性使您能够确定以下不同元素之间的差异。

trans-unit.source: |Element|IsEmptyElement Value| |-------------|--------------------------| |`<item num="123"/>`|`true`| |`<item num="123">test</item>`|`false`| |`<item num="123"></item>`|`false`|
<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current node is an empty element; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果当前节点为空元素;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating if the current node represents an XPath node.
trans-unit.target: 获取一个值，该值指示当前节点是否表示一个 XPath 节点。

trans-unit.source: Always returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 始终返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, determines whether the current <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is at the same position as the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，确定是否当前<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>于指定的相同位置<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The IsSamePosition method assumes that the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified shares the same implementation and is points at the same document instance as the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: IsSamePosition 方法假设<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>指定共享相同的实现并且与当前<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>相同的文档实例指向</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This method always returns `false` under the following conditions: - The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified shares the same implementation but points at a different document instance than the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法始终返回`false`以下情况下:-<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>指定共享相同的实现，但比当前<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>的另一个文档实例中的点</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has a different implementation than the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>具有不同于当前<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>实现</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>-

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to compare to this <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>要与此<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the two <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> objects have the same position; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果两个<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>对象具有相同的位置; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, gets the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name*> of the current node without any namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，获取<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name*>的当前节点不带任何命名空间前缀。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name*>

trans-unit.source: The local name returned depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 取决于返回的本地名称<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>当前节点。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: For example, the local name for the `<bk:book>` element is `book`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，为的本地名称`<bk:book>`元素是`book`。

trans-unit.source: The following table lists the value returned by the LocalName property, based on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 下表列出了基于 LocalName 属性返回的值<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>当前节点。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: |XPathNodeType|Property Value| |-------------------|--------------------| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The local name of the element.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The local name of the attribute.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The prefix associated with the namespace URI.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|The target of the processing instruction.| |All other <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nodes|<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>.|
trans-unit.target: |XPathNodeType |属性值 | |-------------------|--------------------| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|元素的本地名称。 | |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|该属性的本地名称。 | |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|命名空间 URI 与关联的前缀。 | |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|处理指令的目标。 | |所有其他<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>节点 |<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>。 |</xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the local name of the current node, or <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> if the current node does not have a name (for example, text or comment nodes).
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.String>，其中包含当前节点的本地名称或<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>如果当前节点没有名称 （例如，文本或注释节点）。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the namespace URI for the specified prefix.
trans-unit.target: 获取指定前缀的命名空间 URI。

trans-unit.source: If <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> is specified as the `prefix` parameter, the currently assigned default namespace URI is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>指定为`prefix`参数，返回了 URI 的当前分配的默认命名空间。</xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If no default namespace URI is explicitly assigned, and <xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName> is specified as the `prefix` parameter, the blank prefix is associated with elements that are not in any namespace, and <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> is returned.
trans-unit.target: 如果没有默认命名空间 URI 显式分配，和<xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>指定为`prefix`参数，空白的前缀都不任何命名空间中的元素与关联和<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>返回。</xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.String.Empty?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The prefix to namespace URI mappings can change from node to node in an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> 命名空间 URI 映射到的前缀可以更改 XML 文档中的从一个节点到另一个节点。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the value of the LookupNamespace method may not be consistent from one node to the next.
trans-unit.target: 因此，LookupNamespace 方法的值可能不一致从一个节点到下一步。

trans-unit.source: The prefix whose namespace URI you want to resolve.
trans-unit.target: 要解析其命名空间 URI 的前缀。

trans-unit.source: To match the default namespace, pass <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: 若要匹配默认命名空间，传递<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the namespace URI assigned to the namespace prefix specified; <xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""></xref> if no namespace URI is assigned to the prefix specified.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>，其中包含 URI 分配给命名空间的命名空间前缀指定;<xref uid="langword_csharp_null" name="null" href=""> </xref>如果没有命名空间 URI 分配给指定的前缀。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> returned is atomized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>返回原子化的。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Gets the prefix declared for the specified namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 获取为指定的命名空间 URI 声明的前缀。

trans-unit.source: The LookupPrefix method returns the first prefix that matches the namespace URI specified.
trans-unit.target: LookupPrefix 方法返回与匹配的命名空间 URI 指定的第一个前缀。

trans-unit.source: Multiple prefixes referring to the same namespace URI are not ordered in any particular way, so a particular prefix may not be returned each time when more than one is assigned.
trans-unit.target: 多个引用相同的命名空间的前缀以任何特定的方式，因此特定前缀可能不会返回多个分配时每次，URI 才不进行排序。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > Namespace URI to prefix mappings can change from node to node in an XML document.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE]&1;> Namespace URI 的前缀映射可以更改 XML 文档中的从一个节点到另一个节点。

trans-unit.source: As a result, the value of the LookupPrefix method may not be consistent from one node to the next.
trans-unit.target: 因此，LookupPrefix 方法的值可能不一致从一个节点到下一步。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI to resolve for the prefix.
trans-unit.target: 命名空间 URI 为前缀解析。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> that contains the namespace prefix assigned to the namespace URI specified; otherwise, <xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName> if no prefix is assigned to the namespace URI specified.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>包含命名空间前缀分配给命名空间 URI; 否则为<xref:System.String?displayProperty=fullName>如果没有前缀分配给指定 URI 的命名空间。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.String> returned is atomized.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.String>返回原子化的。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the current node matches the specified XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: 确定当前节点是否与指定的 XPath 表达式匹配。

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression.
trans-unit.target: XPath 表达式。

trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果当前节点匹配指定的 XPath 表达式;否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression cannot be evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 无法计算 XPath 表达式。

trans-unit.target: 确定当前节点是否匹配所指定<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method has no effect on the state of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法不起作用的<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>状态

trans-unit.source: This method is identical to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Matches%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, except that a <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> object containing the compiled XPath expression is specified, rather than an XPath expression <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法等同于<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Matches%2A?displayProperty=fullName>方法，只不过<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression>指定包含已编译的 XPath 表达式的对象，而不是 XPath 表达式<xref:System.String>.</xref:System.String> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Matches%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"> </xref>对象，其中包含已编译的 XPath 表达式。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the current node matches the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果当前节点匹配<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathExpression"> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression cannot be evaluated.
trans-unit.target: 无法计算 XPath 表达式。

trans-unit.source: The XPath expression is not valid.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the same position as the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时移动<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>到与指定的同一位置<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This method always returns `true` if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified is an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> that shares the same implementation and points at the same document instance as the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法始终返回`true`如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>指定的<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>共享相同的实现和指向与当前<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>相同的文档实例</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: This method always returns `false` if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> specified is an <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> that has a different implementation than the current <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 此方法始终返回`false`如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>指定<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>，其不同于当前<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>的实现</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> positioned on the node that you want to move to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>位于你想要将移动到的节点上。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the same position as the specified <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>成功地移动到指定的相同位置<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"> </xref>; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the attribute with the matching local name and namespace URI.
trans-unit.target: 将移动<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>到具有匹配的本地名称和命名空间 URI 的属性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on an element, this method returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>当前未定位在元素上，则此方法返回`false`。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: After a successful call to MoveToAttribute, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A> properties reflect the values of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 成功调用了 MoveToAttribute， <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A>，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A>和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A>属性反映属性的值。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an attribute, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>定位在属性上，方法<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>，和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>不适用。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the navigator.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法始终返回`false`，不会更改导航器位置。

trans-unit.source: Rather, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A> to move to the next attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 相反，你可以调用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A>可以移到下一步的属性节点。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: Once positioned on an attribute, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move to the owner element.
trans-unit.target: 后定位在属性上，你可以调用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>移动到所有者元素。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>

trans-unit.source: The local name of the attribute.

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the attribute; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>成功移动到的属性; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: The return value of the MoveToChild method depends on the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the current node, and the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> of the child node to move to.
trans-unit.target: MoveToChild 方法的返回值依赖于<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>的当前节点中，与<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>要将移动到的子节点。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the different <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> nodes, and the child nodes they can move to.
trans-unit.target: 下表显示了不同<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>节点，并且它们可以移动到的子节点。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: |Current Node's XPathNodeType|Child Node's XPathNodeType| |----------------------------------|--------------------------------| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.| |All other <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> values|None.|
trans-unit.target: |当前节点的 XPathNodeType |子节点的 XPathNodeType | |----------------------------------|--------------------------------| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.| |<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>|<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>, or <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>.| |所有其他<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>值 |None.|</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"></xref> of the child node to move to.
trans-unit.target: <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType"> </xref>要将移动到的子节点。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the child node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>成功地移动到的子节点; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>的位置<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the child node with the local name and namespace URI specified.
trans-unit.target: 将移动<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>到的本地名称和命名空间 URI 指定的子节点。

trans-unit.source: The local name of the child node to move to.
trans-unit.target: 要将移动到的子节点本地名称。

trans-unit.source: The namespace URI of the child node to move to.
trans-unit.target: 命名空间的子节点的 URI 将移到。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the child node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>成功地移动到的子节点; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>的位置<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the first sibling node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 将移动<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>至当前节点的第一个同级节点。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the first sibling node of the current node; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if there is no first sibling, or if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is currently positioned on an attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>成功地移动到当前节点; 的第一个同级节点<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果没有任何第一个同级，或者如果<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>当前位于属性节点上。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is already positioned on the first sibling, <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> will return <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> and will not move its position.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>已位于上的第一个同级<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>将返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>将不会移动其位置。

trans-unit.source: If MoveToFirst returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> because there is no first sibling, or if <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is currently positioned on an attribute, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果 MoveToFirst 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>原因是没有第一个同级，或者如果<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>当前所处的位置，属性<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>保持不变。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the first attribute of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时移动<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>到当前节点的第一个属性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on an element, this method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not change.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>当前未定位在元素上，则此方法返回`false`和位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>不会更改。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: After a successful call to MoveToFirstAttribute, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A> properties reflect the values of the attribute.
trans-unit.target: 成功调用了 MoveToFirstAttribute， <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A>，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A>和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A>属性反映属性的值。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Prefix%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.NamespaceURI%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.LocalName%2A>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an attribute, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>定位在属性上，方法<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>，和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>不适用。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法始终返回`false`，不会更改<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>的位置

trans-unit.source: Rather, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A> to move to the next attribute node.
trans-unit.target: 相反，你可以调用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A>可以移到下一步的属性节点。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextAttribute%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an attribute, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move to the owner element.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位于在特性上，你可以调用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>移动到所有者元素。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the first attribute of the current node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>成功地移动到当前节点的第一个属性; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>的位置<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>保持不变。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the first child node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时移动<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>至当前节点的第一个子节点。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> are the only two <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> values that can have children.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>是只有两个<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>可以有子级的值。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType></xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: This property always returns `false` for all other <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> node types.
trans-unit.target: 此属性始终返回`false`对于所有其他<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>节点类型。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the first child node of the current node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>成功地移动到当前节点的第一个子节点; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>的位置<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>保持不变。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to first namespace node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 将移动<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>至当前节点的第一个命名空间节点。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class returns namespace nodes in reverse document order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>类按反向文档顺序返回命名空间节点。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, MoveToFirstNamespace essentially moves to the last namespace node in the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 因此，MoveToFirstNamespace 实质上移到最后一个命名空间节点在当前范围内。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has been moved to the namespace node, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> property reflects the name of the namespace.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>已移动到命名空间节点，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A>属性反映命名空间的名称。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位于命名空间节点，方法<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>，和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>不适用。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法始终返回`false`，不会更改<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>的位置

trans-unit.source: Rather, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A> to move to the next namespace node.
trans-unit.target: 相反，你可以调用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A>可以移到下一步的命名空间节点。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an namespace node, call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move back to the element node.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>定位在命名空间节点上，调用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>将移到元素节点。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: For a definition of namespace nodes, see section 5.4 of the W3C XML Path Language (XPath) recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.
trans-unit.target: 命名空间节点的定义，请参阅位于 http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model W3C XML 路径语言 (XPath) 建议的 5.4 节。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the first namespace node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>成功地移动到第一个命名空间节点; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>的位置<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>保持不变。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the first namespace node that matches the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope"></xref> specified.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时移动<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>到匹配的第一个命名空间节点<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNamespaceScope"></xref>指定。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> class returns namespace nodes in reverse document order.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>类按反向文档顺序返回命名空间节点。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Therefore, MoveToFirstNamespace essentially moves to the last namespace node in the current scope.
trans-unit.target: 因此，MoveToFirstNamespace 实质上移到最后一个命名空间节点在当前范围内。

trans-unit.source: Using the following XML fragment as an example, if the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on the `data` node, MoveToFirstNamespace behaves in the following manner.
trans-unit.target: 例如，使用以下 XML 片段，如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位于`data`节点，按以下方式 MoveToFirstNamespace 的行为。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.All)` moves to one of the following namespace nodes: `xmlns:c='C'`, `xmlns:a='A2'`, `xmlns=''`, `xmlns:b='B'`, or `xmlns:xml='http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace'`.
trans-unit.target: -`MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.All)`将移至以下命名空间节点之一︰ `xmlns:c='C'`， `xmlns:a='A2'`， `xmlns=''`， `xmlns:b='B'`，或`xmlns:xml='http://www.w3.org/XML/1998/namespace'`。

trans-unit.source: - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.ExcludeXml)` moves to one of the following namespace nodes: `xmlns:c='C'`, `xmlns:a='A2'`, `xmlns=''`, or `xmlns:b='B'`.
trans-unit.target: -`MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.ExcludeXml)`将移至以下命名空间节点之一︰ `xmlns:c='C'`， `xmlns:a='A2'`， `xmlns=''`，或`xmlns:b='B'`。

trans-unit.source: - `MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.Local)` moves to the `xmlns:c='C'` node.
trans-unit.target: -`MoveToFirstNamespace(XPathNamespaceScope.Local)`将移到`xmlns:c='C'`节点。

trans-unit.source: ``` <root xmlns='urn:default' xmlns:a='A1' xmlns:b='B'> <item xmlns='' xmlns:a='A2'> <data xmlns:c='C' /> </item> </root> ``` If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on an element, this method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not change.
trans-unit.target: ``` <root xmlns='urn:default' xmlns:a='A1' xmlns:b='B'> <item xmlns='' xmlns:a='A2'> <data xmlns:c='C' /> </item> </root> ```如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>当前未定位在元素上，则此方法返回`false`和位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>不会更改。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has been moved to the namespace node, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> property reflects the name of the namespace.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>已移动到命名空间节点，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A>属性反映命名空间的名称。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位于命名空间节点，方法<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>，和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>不适用。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法始终返回`false`，不会更改<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>的位置

trans-unit.source: Rather, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A> to move to the next namespace node.
trans-unit.target: 相反，你可以调用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A>可以移到下一步的命名空间节点。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an namespace node, call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move back to the element node.

trans-unit.source: - If <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary passed as a parameter is `null` the next following node with the specified <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> is located in document order.
trans-unit.target: -如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>作为参数传递的边界是`null`具有指定的下一步以下节点<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType>位于按文档顺序。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNodeType> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary passed as a parameter is positioned over an attribute or namespace node, it is equivalent to the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> boundary parameter having been positioned on the first child node of its parent element.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves to the node that has an attribute of type `ID` whose value matches the specified <xref:System.String>.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写，将移动到具有类型的属性的节点`ID`其值与匹配的指定<xref:System.String>。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: This method can be used to identify nodes by unique `ID` provided the source document explicitly declares attributes of type `ID` using a DTD.
trans-unit.target: 此方法可以用于标识节点由唯一`ID`提供源文档中显式声明类型的属性`ID`使用 DTD。

trans-unit.source: For example, suppose the following XML data, `<data><x a="a1"/></data>`, was loaded using a DTD that included the following: `<!ATTLIST x a ID #REQUIRED>`.
trans-unit.target: 例如，假设下面的 XML 数据， `<data><x a="a1"/></data>`，使用包含以下 DTD 加载︰ `<!ATTLIST x a ID #REQUIRED>`。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> was positioned somewhere in the XML data, calling `MoveToId("a1")` positions the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> on the element node `x`.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>所调用的 XML 数据中某个位置处`MoveToId("a1")`位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>元素节点上`x`。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.String> representing the `ID` value of the node to which you want to move.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.String>表示`ID`您想要移动的节点的值。</xref:System.String>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>成功移动; 否则为<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the navigator is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>，则导航器的位置不变。

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the namespace node with the specified namespace prefix.
trans-unit.target: 将移动<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>到具有指定的命名空间前缀的命名空间节点。

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> has been moved to the namespace node, the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> property reflects the name of the namespace.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>已移动到命名空间节点，<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A>属性反映命名空间的名称。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.Name%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位于命名空间节点，方法<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>，和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>不适用。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法始终返回`false`，不会更改<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>的位置

trans-unit.source: Rather, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A> to move to the next namespace node.
trans-unit.target: 相反，你可以调用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A>可以移到下一步的命名空间节点。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNextNamespace%2A>

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on a namespace node, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move back to the element node.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位于在命名空间节点上，可以调用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>将移到元素节点。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: For a definition of namespace nodes, see section 5.4 of the W3C XML Path Language (XPath) recommendation located at http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model.
trans-unit.target: 命名空间节点的定义，请参阅位于 http://www.w3.org/TR/xpath#data-model W3C XML 路径语言 (XPath) 建议的 5.4 节。

trans-unit.source: The namespace prefix of the namespace node.
trans-unit.target: 命名空间节点的命名空间前缀。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the specified namespace; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if a matching namespace node was not found, or if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is not positioned on an element node.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>成功地移动到指定的命名空间;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果找不到匹配的命名空间节点，或如果<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>不定位在元素节点上。

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>的位置<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>保持不变。

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the next sibling node of the current node.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时移动<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>至当前节点的下一个同级节点。

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the next sibling node; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if there are no more siblings or if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is currently positioned on an attribute node.

trans-unit.source: Moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the next sibling node with the local name and namespace URI specified.
trans-unit.target: 将移动<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>具有本地名称和命名空间 URI 的下一个同级节点。

trans-unit.target: 命名空间将移到下一个同级节点的 URI。

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the next sibling node; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if there are no more siblings, or if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is currently positioned on an attribute node.

trans-unit.source: When overridden in a derived class, moves the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> to the next attribute.
trans-unit.target: 当在派生类中重写时移动<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>到下一个属性。

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is not currently positioned on an attribute, this method returns `false` and the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> does not change.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>当前未定位在属性，则此方法返回`false`和位置<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>不会更改。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an attribute, the methods <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>, <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>, and <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> methods are not applicable.
trans-unit.target: 当<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>定位在属性上，方法<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A>， <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A>，和<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A>方法不适用。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToFirst%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToPrevious%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToNext%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: These methods always return `false` and do not change the position of the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.
trans-unit.target: 这些方法始终返回`false`，不会更改<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>.</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>的位置

trans-unit.source: After the <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator> is positioned on an attribute, you can call <xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> to move to the owner element.
trans-unit.target: 后<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>位于在特性上，你可以调用<xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A>移动到所有者元素。</xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator.MoveToParent%2A> </xref:System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator>

trans-unit.source: Returns <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is successful moving to the next attribute; <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> if there are no more attributes.
trans-unit.target: 返回<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>如果<xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref>成功地移动到下一个属性;<xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>如果没有更多属性。

trans-unit.source: If <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>, the position of the <xref href="System.Xml.XPath.XPathNavigator"></xref> is unchanged.
